name: politico
text:
When it comes to the Biden veepstakes, @MarcACaputo says, "There's really only six or seven people in the United States who know what the hell is going on."

He explains what you need to know about four of the top contenders on today's POLITICO Dispatch https://t.co/Wn2aA3WD3r

name: politico
text:
In his first-ever appearance before Congress, Amazon CEO Jeff Bezos offers a message his fellow tech CEOs will like: Big is good.

“Just like the world needs small companies, it also needs large ones,” Bezos plans to tell a House Judiciary panel tomorrow
https://t.co/P2dm6gUoSW

name: politico
text:
The EU will limit the export of "sensitive" equipment that could be used for surveillance in Hong Kong as part of a joint response to China's new "national security" legislation in the region

https://t.co/WFVXDYjrPM

name: politico
text:
During a campaign event today, Joe Biden held notes with Kamala Harris’ name scrawled across the top, followed by five talking points:

– “Do not hold grudges”
– “Campaigned with me & Jill”
– “Talented”
– “Great help to campaign”
– “Great respect for her”
https://t.co/3OH2f2QK6f

name: politico
text:
The coronavirus pandemic and the economic devastation it’s unleashed are pushing Joe Biden and the Democratic Party further to the left on health care. But it may not be far enough for some progressives

https://t.co/E8KklZLfYo

name: politico
text:
Democrats are gearing up to push for changes to a small business aid plan pitched by Republicans as part of the latest economic relief package, as Joe Biden called for major new investments in firms owned by people of color

https://t.co/RQ8P2C2jpm

name: politico
text:
The role of Big Tech in our daily lives has intensified during the Covid-19 crisis.

With Americans out of work and small businesses dying off at a rapid clip, these companies are growing bigger, more dominant, more seemingly unstoppable
https://t.co/gRcEu44Sbc
